title: What is the latest technology that we should expect soon? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1 million mile battery400 KW batterylvl 2 AI for cars, so they can rightfully call it “autopilot” instead of “driver assist”, resulting in the AI fully can drive the caran entirely new kind of clean and green energy will come in ca 5 years, very simple to buildhighly efficient and simple desalination,on the far horizon is spintronics where microchips doesn’t genrate much heat, nor use much power so you can stack them and uphold Moore’s Law
